commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
Sourabh Rajdev

Software Engineer

  • Email

    sourahbrajdev25@gmail.com

  • Phone

    +91-963-046-6696

  • Location

    Bhopal, India

About me

Aspiring Software Engineer with strong foundations in data structures, algorithms, and distributed systems.

Experienced in building scalable backend services and cloud-native applications. Eager to contribute to an impactful engineering team.

What i'm doing

  • Backend Development

    High-quality development of scalable and secure backend services.

  • Cloud & DevOps

    Building and deploying cloud-native applications on AWS.

  • Data Science

    Implementing ETL pipelines and creating analytics dashboards.

  • AI Engineering

    Engineering machine learning and NLP systems with a focus on optimization.

Resume

Education

  1. Vellore Institute of Technology, Bhopal

    2022 — 2026

    B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering. Relevant coursework in Advanced Algorithms, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing.

Experience

  1. Data Science Intern

    The Energy and Resources Institute (TERI)
    May 2025 — Present

    Led a sustainability analytics initiative, improving recycling prediction accuracy by 70% and implementing scalable ETL pipelines with Apache Spark.

  2. Machine Learning Engineer

    Outlier (Remote)
    Dec 2024 — Feb 2025

    Engineered multilingual NLP systems with 92% accuracy and reduced inference latency by 40% through optimization.

  3. Software Development Engineer

    HiAiDo
    Nov 2023 — Mar 2024

    Migrated legacy backend to cloud-native AWS microservices, reducing latency by 30% and designing end-to-end analytics dashboards.

My skills

  • Java, Python, C++, SQL
    95%
  • AWS, Spark, TensorFlow, Power BI
    90%
  • Microservices, REST APIs, Data Pipelines
    85%
  • MySQL, MongoDB, Redis
    80%

Portfolio

  • AI-Powered Crime Detection System

    University Project

  • Payments Reconciliation Engine

    Enterprise Simulation

Contact

Contact Form
